resources.string: In Android, Switch is a two-state toggle

This is a App that converts text to speech. It allows both direct typed text to be converted and also any text file.


Converting Files to speech allows the user to listen to the content of his\her file whenever required. They may listen its content without seeing the screen.


Converting Text to speech directly allows user who may be in a condition where they cannot speak (Soar throat,Dumb etc) to voice his/her opinions.
